org.mini2Dx.tiled

Class TiledMapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.tiled.TiledMapData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TiledParserListener

    public class TiledMapData
extends java.lang.Object
implements TiledParserListener
    Data parsed from a TMX file created with Tiled
